card_text.english: Summon a Plague Ward into Venomancer's lane each deployment phase.
Summon two Plague Wards.
Before the action phase, deal 2 piercing damage to a random enemy neighbor of Plague Ward.
Active 2: Move Meepo to an allied Meepo's lane. Deal 2 damage to the new enemy neighbors.
Move Meepo to an allied Meepo's lane. Deal 2 damage to the new enemy neighbors.
Meepo has Soulbound. (If Meepo dies, other allied Meepos in every lane also die.)
Summon a Meepo.

Lucent Beam
Before the action phase, deal 1 piercing damage to a random enemy and add a charge to each Eclipse card in your hand or deck.
Before the action phase, deal 1 piercing damage to a random enemy and add a charge to three random Eclipse cards in your hand or deck.
Repeat one time for each charge:  Deal 3 piercing damage to a random enemy.
Active 2: Move Winter Wyvern to an empty combat position and give it +4 Attack this round.
Move Winter Wyvern to an empty combat position and give it +4 Attack this round.
Disarm a unit until end of round.  That unit's allied neighbors battle it.

Stun Tidehunter's enemy neighbors this round and each other enemy has a 50% chance of being stunned this round.

Deal 3 damage to a unit and disarm it this round.
